title: Womens Summer Hide Belly Knee Length Travel Dress Pocket 2025 Spring Short Sleeve Midi Work Casual Teacher Outfits
description: Long waist can be gathered, up or down, depending upon torso length and the stretch allows it to accommodate multiple waist sizes.

Hide Belly Design, Beautiful Choice: Free adjustment of waistline height through elastic waistband and movable drawstring, visually elongates the torso, hide belly skillfully, make wearer more beautiful.
Nice slit pockets on the side of the skirt: big enough and deep enough,nice cut and don't make wearer hips look bigger.
Easy travel & vacation outfits: easy to pack and wash, easy to dress up.
Great teacher dress for busy women: Modest yet attractive, wearing it for a long time is also very comfortable.
